item.title: What is an unfurnished apartment? (unm√∂bliert)
item.description: There is no furniture in the apartment and it will be empty. You might find a stove and a sink but that is all. You will have to get your own: Bed Kitchen - Probably the most expensive part Internet connection - takes a few weeks. Internet providers are not quick to setup connections, or anything really. Switch your electricity provider - Electricity is available by default, although that can get expensive Furniture - tables, chairs, lights, etc.
